Title: Intergas Rapid Plus combi boiler and flue pack 25kW
Description: Supplying highly efficient heating and hot water, the Intergas Rapid 25kW combi boiler is supplied here with a standard horizontal flue as well as an Intergas Rapid spacer frame for hassle-free specification. Designed for domestic use, this simple boiler has all the benefits of the brand's innovative condensing boiler technology in an installer-friendly package for easier fitting and maintenance. Thanks to its inbuilt expansion vessel there's no need to install the Rapid with a jig and an easy to remove front panel makes it possible to reach internal parts with minimal effort.
category: Boilers/Boiler Packs/Intergas Boilers/Intergas Boilers.csv -> Intergas Rapid Plus combi boiler and flue pack 25kW
Feature 7: Priority domestic hot water (additional set up required)

Title: Intergas HRE 24/18 combi boiler and horizontal flue
Description: Reliably supplying both heating and hot water with no need for additional water storage, the Intergas HRE 24/18 combi boiler with horizontal flue has a compact design and reduced number of components meaning less chance of breakdown and lower maintenance costs. This practical combi is fitted with a highly efficient double heat exchanger as well as a self-learning eco mode, contributing to its excellent ErP A rating for reduced fuel bills and a reduced carbon footprint.

Title: Intergas Xclusive 24 combi boiler only 24kW
Description: Full of great features, the Intergas Xclusive 24 combi boiler pack high-efficiency combi compact boiler offers a user-friendly illuminated touchscreen display panel, an expansion vessel, combined PRV, condensate connection, an integral filling loop and dual OpenTherm inputs. ErP A-rated, this 24kW combi is supplied with the RF module as standard, meaning that the Xclusive has immediate compatibility with the Intergas ComfortTouch app, turning your smartphone into a handy smart thermostat for heating control on the go.
